mapper.select: select q.req_num,s.shop_num,s.shop_name, p.pro_name,p.pro_code,q.pro_size,p.pro_price,p.pro_img,p.pro_barcode, q.pro_amount, q.req_status,q.req_date from product p, stockreq q, shop s where p.pro_code = q.pro_code and q.shop_num = s.shop_num and q.req_status='wait' order by req_num desc
mapper.update: update stockreq set req_status=#{req_status} where req_num =#{req_num}
mapper.select: select q.req_num,s.shop_num,s.shop_name, p.pro_name,p.pro_code,q.pro_size,p.pro_price,p.pro_img,p.pro_barcode, q.pro_amount, q.req_status,q.req_date from product p, stockreq q, shop s where p.pro_code = q.pro_code and q.shop_num = s.shop_num and q.shop_num=#{shop_num} order by req_num desc
